PropertyList.title: Ilyushin Il-76MD
PropertyList.text:
Wellcome to version 4.0.2 of IL-76MD
- Check cargo and/or payload: press y to switch to the ramp control and open the red box, for loading paratroopers or fire trucks. - Paratroopers need open back door and both side doors open to jump out, then use the switch on the panel to give the signal :) - Many systems as in the AN-12BK, AN-22A or Tu-160-Blackjack, refer to them for more help - Extra animations for Livery Scalpel (shut down engines)
Il-76MD Skal'pel MT - Mobile Hospital Il-76MD Built without military equipment
The aircraft is meant for parachute operations and landing of military personnel, military equipment, cargoes, fuel and containers. By reinforcing its main structural elements (airframe and landing gear), the maximum takeoff weight and commercial load have been increased.
